module.name: marketplace
module.description: Now convert your hotel booking website into a marketplace.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: With the QloApps marketplace you will be able to convert your website into a marketplace of hotels and rooms. Admin can grant access to Sellers/Hoteliers to add and sell hotel rooms and earn commission for bookings made by customers through the website.

module.name: wkmyallocatorconnector
module.description: Now integrate myallocator channel manager with qloapps.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: We bring to you the QloApps Myallocator Connector which seamlessly connects QloApps with Myallocator channel manager. Now Hoteliers can easily synchronize room inventory and rates of room types for various hotel properties.

module.name: wkccavenuepayment
module.description: Using this module you can integrate and allow payment through CCAvenue payment gateway.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps CCAvenue Payment Gateway add-on allows guests to make online payments through CCAvenue payment gateway. Hotel owners can configure it in the back office and allow guests to pay via the CCAvenue payment gateway. Guests can make quick, responsive, and secure payments using the CCAvenue payment gateway.

module.name: qlostripepayment
module.description: Accept payments using Stripe payment gateway. Manage stripe transactions refunds.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: Accept online payments seamlessly with QloApps Stripe Payment Gateway. This addon enables you to accept credit cards directly on your site via your Stripe account, enhancing customer experience and simplifying transactions.

module.name: qlomangopaypayment
module.description: Allows customers to use Mangopay for payments.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Mangopay Payment gateway is an add-on that enables clients to pay for hotel bookings through the Mangopay payment gateway on your website.

module.name: qlorazorpaypayment
module.description: Using this module, accept payments with Razorpay payment gateway from your customers with Card/Netbanking/Wallet.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Razorpay Payment Gateway is an add-on which allows you to accept online payments through Razorpay Payment Gateway. It accepts all major debit and credit cards, UPI, net banking banks and few wallets. Further, you can set up Webhook from your Dashboard so that when a refund event is triggered you get notification about its status update. Thus, you can fast forward your business and increase conversions.

module.name: wktourpackages
module.description: Using this module, Manage tours and packages. You can create holiday packages including stay or without stay.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Tours and Packages is an add-on that will allow the admin to sell tour packages from his hotel website. Admin will be able to create packages, add activities, events and transportation then sell the whole package to the end user. This QloApps addon will create new opportunities for the hotelier to increase the revenue by selling tours along with hotels.

module.name: wkgdpr
module.displayName: GDPR Compliance | Data Protection and EU Cookie Law
module.description: This module allows you to fully comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and EU Cookie Policy.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: The European Union regulations are effective from 25th May, 2018. This module allows hoteliers to make their hotel reservation website General Data Protection Regulation and EU Cookie Law. Admin can enable or disable the auto-approval of personal data deletion of the customers. Configure GDPR email notification settings.Configure the position, image, and text of a cookie block at the QloApps website(Front End).Set the colour of cookie block buttons like accept, manage, next, back and done buttons.

module.name: wkrediscache
module.description: Use Redis as cache server to give best performance to your website
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Redis Cache is an addon for QloApps which improves the performance of your website by improving the load time of your Hotel Booking Website. It basically creates an in-memory cache to store the high-level data types and hence improving the performance of your website.

module.name: qloadminloginascustomer
module.description: Admin can login as customer in front office.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: Admin Login as Customer is a module for QloApps which allows the admin to log in into his customer's account. With the help of this module, the admin can access the entire customer account.

module.name: qlologincaptcha
module.description: Google reCAPTCHA is a security service that helps protect websites from spam and abuse by verifying that a user is human, not a bot. It uses advanced risk analysis techniques to distinguish between legitimate users and automated programs.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: If you have any kind of form on your website then you are prone to spams. So there is always a need to have a security measure on your website. The reCAPTCHA stands as a gatekeeper for the entries coming onto your website. With the help of QloApps reCAPTCHA module, you will be able to secure your QloApps website from spams and abuse.

module.name: qloageverification
module.description: Verifies age of user before visiting to the store.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: Restricting Underage Users from your hotel website can be an important aspect of your hotel business. And that is why we need Age Verification on our hotel website. So we have developed the QloApps Age Verification add-on to restrict underage users from your website. With the help of this module Set the minimum age required for visitors to enter the website.

module.name: qlowhatsapp
module.description: This addon integrates WhatsApp into your hotel website, enabling direct guest communication. Guests can also share their experience via WhatsApp. It enhances customer service and boosts social sharing for increased visibility.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps WhatsApp Support and Share is an add-on for QloApps. It will help you to support your website visitors, guests and customer via WhatsApp. And your users will be able to share their experience with your website via WhatsApp.

module.name: qlofbmessenger
module.description: Boost customer relations with live chat.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: Social Live Chat is an add-on for QloApps. This add-on will allow you to live chat with your website visitors via Facebook Messenger. With the help of this module, you will be able to provide support to your QloApps website visitors and customers through live chat.

module.name: qlogifimageupload
module.description: Upload and display GIF images for room type, hotel, service products and header logo.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps GIF image upload is an add-on that will bring the functionality of using GIFs as logo image and room type images on your QloApps hotel booking website. This will not only make your hotel booking website look elegant but also increase its effectiveness

module.name: qlosociallogin
module.description: Enhances the user experience by enabling registration and login through popular social platforms. Guests can quickly sign up or log in using their social accounts, eliminating need for manual form completion.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Social Login is an add-on that simplifies user access to your website by allowing them to log in using their existing accounts on Google, Facebook, X (Twitter), Apple, LinkedIn, and Amazon. With this feature, users can skip the traditional registration process and instantly log in with a single click, making the booking experience smoother and faster.

module.name: qloroomtypevideo
module.description: Allows hoteliers to add videos of room types. Showcasing room features and ambiance through videos provides guests with an immersive experience, boosting engagement and increasing bookings.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Room Type Videos is an add-on for QloApps which will allow you to upload videos for your room types.With the help of this module, you will be able to show videos on room type page with the help of Youtube embed URLs.

module.name: qloblog
module.description: Write and manage blog for your e-commerce site
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Advance Blog is an addon for QloApps which will allow you to publish blogs on your website.Publish content on your website will lead to better customer engagement. It will also help your website to rank better in SERPs.

module.name: qlospinandwin
module.description: This module generate voucher for the customer using spin the wheel. It enables customer to generate voucher in smart way. It helps you to increase customer on your website and growth of selling.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Spin and Win is an addon that will add Spin the Wheel Game on your website. This game will allure your customers to your website. In their quest of winning a price, the users will put in more time on the hotel booking website. Hence, increasing your dwell time which is one of the elixirs you need to rank on a search engine.

module.name: qlowebp
module.description: Upload and display webP images for room types and logo.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps WebP Image Converter is an add-on for QloApps which will convert your website images to WebP for faster websites. The JPG and PNG images are heavy and take time to load. WebP images are lesser in size with the same quality hence, improving the site speed without compromising the user experience.

module.name: qlowordpresspost
module.description: This module allow to display blogs in your hotel website from your wordpress blog system.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Wordpress Blog is an addon for QloApps. With the help of this addon, you will be able to show up to 500 Wordpress blogs on your QloApps hotel booking website. So in simple words, this addon will fetch blogs from your Wordpress website and display them on your QloApps website.

module.name: qlogeolocation
module.description: Auto changes language and currency by geolocation.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Geolocation is an addon for QloApps which detects the location of the user and sets the location and currency of the website accordingly. It also fills the city & zip code column in the customer’s address form automatically based on the user’s location.

module.name: qlo360view
module.description: Admin can configure the 360° view for room types, allowing users to explore rooms interactively with a full rotation.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: This QloApps addon will allow you to showcase your rooms via 360°images. This will give the guests a better idea of rooms to your guests hence increasing your chances of getting a booking.

module.name: qloslider
module.description: This module helps you to create and display different types of hotel, room type and image sliders at different pages and places.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Sliders is an addon for QloApps which will show different types of sliders on your hotel booking website. With the help of QloApps Sliders, you will be able to show the rooms, hotel, and images on different pages which will give you cross-sale opportunities, boost your SEO and improve UI.

module.name: qloamp
module.description: Provides AMP pages for Home Page, Search result, Room type, checkout and CMS pages.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps AMP (Accelerated Mobile Pages): QloApps AMP is a revolutionary add-on for QloApps that allows hoteliers to create AMP pages of their hotel booking website launched by QloApps. It will make your hotel website load faster on mobile devices. It will improve customer experience with the help of Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP). The hotel owner can make AMP pages of the home page, search result page, room type page, CMS pages, and checkout page.

module.name: mpondeskbooking
module.description: Now seller will be able to create on desk bookings for customers.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Marketplace On-Desk Booking is an addon for QloApps Marketplace.This addon will allow your marketplace sellers to take on-desk bookings.So whenever a customer walks into a seller’s hotel the seller will take his booking with the help of this addon in order to keep the record of this booking into the system.

module.name: qlogooglecalendarsync
module.description: This modules sync QloApps room bookings to the google calendar. Create calendar for every room and create events for bookings.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: We gladly bring you the QloApps Google calendar Sync add-on. This addon will connect your hotel booking website to Google Calendar. With the help of this addon you will be able to create seperate calendars on Google Calendar for your rooms and room types. This addon will also create events on both admin and customer's calendar for all the bookings made.

module.name: qlopayathotel
module.description: This module allows customers to create bookings without paying while checkout but pay for booking after visiting hotel.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Pay At Hotel is an add-on that will bring the functionality of making payments at the hotel itself while check-in. This module adds a payment option for customers to book hotel rooms without entering card details or making online payments and gives an option for paying at the hotel during check-in.

module.name: qloamazons3
module.description: Amazon Simple Storage Service.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Amazon S3 connects your QloApps website to Amazon S3 storage. So you will be able to upload your images to the cloud and reduce the load from your server. The reduction in load from the server will make your website run smooth hence improving the website performance and user experience.

module.name: qlocustomregistrationfield
module.description: Add custom fields to the customer registration form.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Custom Regiteration Field is an add-on which will help you to gather tailored information from your customer. You can add fields in the Customer Registration Form and gather all the information as per your needs.

module.name: qloregistrationotp
module.description: Add OTP verification to the customer registration process.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Mobile and Email Verification is an add-on for verifying the phone numbers and emails of customers.Protecting your company and users from spams is important to ensure the growth of your business.

module.name: qlomultisocialpost
module.description: Create and schedule advertisement posts on multiple social networks from one place.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: The configuration page allows users to configure the settings to allow posts to publish on social media platforms. Thus, increasing the visibility of users in various social media websites like Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, and Tumblr it is important to mark their presence across all social media platforms.

module.name: qloproductqna
module.displayName: QloApps Room Type Questions and Answers
module.description: Allows guests to know a room type better through questions and answers.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Room Type Questions and Answers is an add-on to voice questions and give their responses. It is an effective section where the admin and customer both can post questions and answers. The customers or the guests also have the option to ask their queries or answer one. If the guest wants to post questions or answers, then they have to enter their name and email ID.

module.name: qlofrontpageslideshow
module.description: QloApps Front Page Slideshow module allows you to create multiple image sliders on different pages and different positions for various purposes.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Frontpage slideshow is an add-on which will create an image slider on your homepage. You can customize the slider by adding navigation options, slide numbers, add intervals between sliders, etc. Further you can upload unlimited images in the slider.

module.name: qlocartreminder
module.description: Send reminders to customers informing about their abandoned carts.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Abandoned Cart Reminder is an add-on which allows the admin to send email to customers if he left the site without booking. When a customer leaves the site after adding room type in the cart then email/emails will be sent to the customer to remind them to complete their booking. Cart reminder emails motivate customers to complete their bookings by sending reminders. You can easily customize the mail and set the hours you want to send email regarding abandoned carts to customers.

module.name: qlomobilelogin
module.description: Registration & Login with Mobile Number and OTP/Password
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: The admin can allow customers to register and log into the website using their mobile number with the help of QloApps Mobile login. By this module customers can easily reset their password by requesting an OTP on their mobile number, If their password is lost. And also email can be set as an optional field on the registration page so that customers can register without . By default QloApps mobile login supports three SMS gateway providers - Twilio, SendinBlue, and onehop (SMS-Magic).

module.name: qlomultibankwire
module.description: Accept payments via multiple bank accounts.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Multi Bank Wire will allow the admin of the hotel booking website to accept payments through multiple bank wire accounts. Default QloApps will show just a single bank wire account details but with this addon, you can show multiple bank wire account details. Hence giving the customer multiple options to make the payment.

module.name: qlocallback
module.description: Allows customers to request a call back from admin.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps callback request is an add-on that integrates a callback request icon on the front end. After clicking on it, a form will open where the customer has to fill in their name, contact number, date, time of call request and reason for request. Admin can get updates through email as soon as a callback request is sent by the customer. Customers have numerous queries and they want to tackle them and this add-on supports them in finding solutions to all of their queries on call. Ultimately, it enhances a customer’s experience.

module.name: qlofrontdesk
module.description: QloApps Front Desk System is a revolutionary add-on for the hoteliers. The addon adds a calendar on your QloApps dashboard which shows all the information in a very easy to understand manner. Hotelier can view, add, edit bookings on your QloApps dashboard calendar. Features like drag and drop bookings to change the date will make your hotel business run at your fingertips.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Front Desk System 4.0.0 is a game-changing upgrade for hoteliers, offering a redesigned front desk page with an intuitive calendar view. Manage bookings effortlessly with drag-and-drop functionality, quick reservation creation, and real-time updates on availability and rates. The new version enhances efficiency with advanced filters, booking indicators, and a seamless interface, making hotel operations smoother than ever.QloApps Front Desk Module.

module.name: qlopropertyvirtualtour
module.description: Using this module you can create 360 virtual tours of your hotels for your guests.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Hotel Virtual Tour is a useful add-on that will allow travellers to interact with your property virtually. Travellers can experience your hotel without actually visiting it. Create a separate Virtual Tour block on the homepage or show it inside the interior block Option to view virtual tour in the room type details so that the visitor can tour the room directly It will show virtual tours on your website and create a separate page with all hotel virtual tours listed. Admin can create multiple virtual tours for all his hotels and display them on the front. Upload panorama images to create an interactive experience, and you also can add multiple hotspots on the image to jump to a different scene

module.name: qloquickview
module.description: The quick view module provides an overview of the product information that users require to make an
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Quick View is a powerful add-on that allows customers to effortlessly view room type details directly from the homepage or search results. By simply hovering over a room type image, a quick view button appears, and with one click, a pop-up displays essential information such as room description, reviews, price, and the 'Book Now' button. This streamlined experience saves time and enhances browsing, ultimately leading to increased bookings.

module.name: qlobackupmanager
module.description: Using this module, you can easily back up the file system and database of QloApps website.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Backup Manager is a useful add-on for hoteliers that helps them to create a hassle-free backup of QloApps file system and database in just a few clicks. Hoteliers have the feasibility to either take the backup of the QloApps file system & database together or create a backup separately for the QloApps file system or database as per their needs. With the help of scheduling cron, hotel owners can create backups automatically on a daily, weekly, or monthly basis.

module.name: qlogoogleaddress
module.displayName: QloApps Auto-fill Address Form | Google Addresses
module.description: Autocompletes address forms using Google services.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Auto-fill Address Form is an add-on that boosts consumer experience by reducing time to fill address details and minimizing the chance of errors. The details include address, zip/postal code, city, and country. All these details are automatically filled in the address information. Both the Customer and Merchant( i.e., Admin) can take advantage of this functionality.

module.name: qlogooglepay
module.description: Accept Payment Using Google Pay Payment Gateway
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Google Pay payment gateway is an add-on that allows integration of the QloApps website with the Google Pay payment gateway. It is one of the most popular payment gateways across the world. It is secure and easy to use. It also saves time for customers by completing payments on the QloApps checkout page rather than having to navigate to another page.

module.name: qlopayupayment
module.description: Using this module, accept payments with PayU payment gateway from your customers with Card/Netbanking/Wallet.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps PayU Payment gateway is an add-on that integrates the PayU Payment gateway to your hotel booking website. It supports both cards debit and credit, UPI, wallet, and more. Thus, your customers will have multiple options from which they can make payments. The admin can use the module in test and live mode. Moreover, it provides high-grade security. So, the details of customers are secure.

module.name: qlogoogletranslate
module.description: This module adds Google Translate widget at back office and front office. It also automates translation process on Translations page.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Google Translate | Translate QloApps Easily is an add-on that makes admin work easier by translating content in just a few minutes. After configuring the module, the admin only have to select the translation type, theme and language. Afterwards, the content will be translated easily. Hence, the admin will not have to translate content one by one. This module will translate the whole contents at once with the help of Google Translator.

module.name: qloexitpopup
module.description: Create Popup Templates with Voucher on Entry/Exit
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Entry/Exit Popup is an add-on that benefits your website by showcasing relevant information. It is easy to customize its text, display, visibility, and the mail you want to send registered customers. You can choose whether to show it at the entry or exit of the guest. Moreover, you can also set the time and date range when the popup should appear on your website. The best part about popups is that it has decent click-through rates, i.e., almost 2 percent higher than other advertisements.

module.name: qloemailtemplate
module.description: This module allows admin to customize email templates.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Email Templates Customizer is an add-on for QloApps that allows the admin to customize the design of your emails to the design you think visually appeal to your customers. Moreover, you can also make it appealing by customizing it according to your business type. You can preview the email while customizing it, so it makes it easy for you to decide which colours and font size will be best applicable.

module.name: qloonlinecheckin
module.description: Add an online check-in feature to your booking system and offer your guests an online and completely contactless check-in.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Online Check-in is an add-on that simplifies the guest’s arrival process by allowing them to check in online. With the increasing need for contactless services, online check-in has become a necessity. This module allows admins to create custom identity fields where they can list the required documents and other details from their guests. Guests must provide this information online, enabling them to check in from any device before their arrival, reducing the need for physical interaction at the front desk. This feature enhances guest safety while increasing staff productivity.

module.name: qlonewsticker
module.description: This module allows to display News/Information/Offers tickers to guests.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps news tickers is an add-on which is seen moving across your website. It is horizontal, custom text-based and is displayed either on the homepage or on all pages of the website in the form of a scroller. You can use it to attract users' attention. Sharing new and important pieces of information is made easy and you can also redirect users to another website by adding URL in the ticker message. The ticker block is displayed either at top, bottom or on both to showcase major happenings.

module.name: qlorewardsystem
module.description: With the help of this module you can give reward to your customer.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Reward System is a powerful add-on of QloApps ecosystem that helps build customer loyalty, increase conversions, attract new customers, and retain the existing ones. Encourage repeat purchases and improve customers' satisfaction by implementing an effective reward program.

module.name: qlobuybutton
module.description: This module helps admin to create a Buy Button widget.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: Embed buy buttons or cards on your external websites or blog pages to increase traffic on your hotel website and boost booking count.

module.name: qloroomlock
module.description: Admin and guests can lock rooms for a specific time durations. Other guests can not book those room for that specific locked time period.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: An add-on that has the ability to reserve or hold a room or multiple rooms for a customer. When a room is on hold, it is not visible to other customers for a particular time duration (days, hours, or minutes).

module.name: qlosumuppayment
module.description: Make your payment through credit card/ debit card/ master card.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Sum Up Payment is an add-on that integrates the Sumup payment gateway to your website. It adds an additional payment option to your website allowing guests to pay for their bookings through it. It supports both debit and credit cards. The payment gateway is secure so you don't have to worry about data breaches.

module.name: qlowatermarkimage
module.description: This module allows admin to add watermarked to various images in the website.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Watermarked Images Allows you to choose an image of your choice & apply it as a watermark on multiple kinds of images available on your hotel's website.

module.name: qloroomtypeextrainfo
module.description: This module allows admin to display custom information on room type detail pages
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Room Type Extra Info is an add-on that will bring the functionality of adding extra information blocks to a particular or all the available room types. This addon allows users to create extra blocks to provide information for the room types.

module.name: qlocheckoutcustomfield
module.description: This module allows admin to accept additional information from customer during checkout.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Checkout Custom Fields module lets you add 10 different types of custom checkout fields to various steps of the Checkout page with a simple and user-friendly interface.

module.name: qloroomtypelabel
module.description: This module allows admin to add icons and text labels on room type images.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps room type label is an add-on which makes your room type more noticeable when you are offering special offers or discounts on them. It can easily grab attention of customers on your new room types or room types in which you are giving offers. Moreover, you can customize the label with logo, text, colors as per your room type. And select pages in which you want to display labels.

module.name: qlooxpaypayment
module.description: This module allows guests to pay using OxPay payment gateway.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps OxPay Payment addon allows guests to make online payments through the OxPay payment gateway.

module.name: qlopaytmpayment
module.description: This module allows guests to pay using Paytm payment gateway.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Paytm payment gateway is an add-on for QloApps. It will integrate the Paytm Payment Gateway to the website to make online payments from customers to admin. Payments may be made using a debit card, credit card, net banking (support 3D secure), UPI, or Paytm Wallet.

module.name: qloseooptimization
module.description: This module allows admin to optimize his website for better search engine indexing.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps SEO Optimization is a very helpful add-on for hoteliers to improve their website SEO ranking and visibility on search engines results pages by performing various SEO techniques.

module.name: qloinstagramfeed
module.description: This module allows admin to display Instagram posts at selected hooks.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Social Feeds is an add-on that helps you to connect your Instagram account with QloApps and fetches all of your posts on multiple pages of your website.

module.name: qloaffiliateprogram
module.description: Allows admin to run affiliate program on his website.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Affiliate Program is an addon for QloApps which will allow your users to become an affiliate on your hotel website and earn rewards for referrals. The admin can offer commission to the affiliates on the new registration and bookings.

module.name: qlosuggestedrooms
module.description: This module suggests rooms to your guests based on viewing history of other guests.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Room Type Suggestions is an add-on that allows guests to view room type suggestions based on the viewing history of other guests.

module.name: qlogoogleretargeting
module.description: This module helps serve targeted advertisements to past visitors of your website using Google Ads platform.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Google Retargeting/Remarketing is an addon that enables you to advertise to people who already visited your website. You can display all your hotels or room types or can select specific hotels or room types. You can target those people who already visited your website. Your hotels and their rooms are displayed when they were scrolling on other sites or searching on Google.

module.name: qlolivenotification
module.description: This module shows notifications to guests based on their activities on the website.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: Add-on that enables admins to display customizable notifications on the frontend. The admin can configure various alerts, such as the number of visitors on the website and users interested in specific room types for the same dates. Customers can view these notifications on the homepage, hotel page, room type detail page, and checkout page. The module enhances engagement by providing real-time alerts, while the admin can customize the appearance of pop-ups, including icon selection, lifespan, position, and maximum display limits on a page.

module.name: qlopwa
module.displayName: QloApps Advanced Progressive Web App | PWA
module.description: QloApps Progressive Web App is an add-on for QloApps that will bring two functionalities to your website. The first one is the web app and the other is push notifications.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Advanced Progressive Web App is a Progressive Web App (PWA) that uses modern web capabilities to deliver an app-like experience to users. This will enable your website visitors to access the website even when you are offline. Web apps are websites that, in many ways, look and feel like native applications with push notifications. The Progressive Web Application is fast compared to the website and supports push notifications. With the use of this addon, your website will work faster on a slower internet connection. It will help you enhance the website's performance speed, which will ultimately lead to increased user engagement and a high conversion rate.

module.name: qloadyenpayment
module.description: This module allows guests to pay using Adyen payment gateway.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: If you are struggling to manage your payments and want to switch to a faster, safer, and more secure payment gateway, then QloApps Adyen Payment Add-on is for you.

module.name: qlocashfreepayment
module.description: This module allows guests to pay using Cashfree payment gateway.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Cashfree Payment | UPI | Wallet provides the Cashfree payment gateway for your guests to pay for their bookings. Addon is supported by SBI, Y Combinator, and API partners and was incubated by PayPal. Provides you with single-click payment options. Provides you with multiple payment options, including net banking, UPI, and wallets.

module.name: qlo2checkoutpayment
module.description: Using this module, accept payments with 2Checkout payment gateway from your customers.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps 2Checkout payment gateway is an add-on that allows integration of the QloApps website with the 2Checkout payment gateway. It supports MasterCard, Visa, American Express, JCB, Discover, and many more. It is secure and easy to use. It also saves time for customers by completing payments on the QloApps checkout page rather than having to navigate to another page.

module.name: qlohoteksmartlock
module.description: Using this module admin can integrate hotek smart lock with QloApps.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Hotek Smart Lock Connector add-on will allow you to send smart keys to the customer when they make bookings on your website. It will enable guest entry through the digital smart key. Hotelier can set configuration to decide on how many days earlier to send the keys to the customer.

module.name: wkmpesapayment
module.description: Recieve payments from M-Pesa payments.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: Introducing QloApps M-Pesa Payment module. This module will allow QloApps admin to accept payments through M-Pesa on their hotel bookings. In M-Pesa, M stands for mobile and Pesa means Money so it is a service which facilitates mobile-based money transactions. Ergo, it allows you to make money transfers through your mobile phone.

module.name: qlocloudflareturnstile
module.description: Add Cloudflare Turnstile to your website forms to protect them from spam and bots. A user-friendly alternative to CAPTCHA to provide a better experience to your guests.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Cloudflare Turnstile: Add Cloudflare Turnstile to your website forms to protect them from spam and bots. A user-friendly alternative to CAPTCHA to provide a better experience to your guests. Enable Turnstile on the login page, registration page, contact us page, back office login, and many more pages.Customizable theme options are available for Turnstile, i.e., auto, light, and dark. Change size to normal or compact according to your website.

module.name: qlopaypaladvancedcheckout
module.description: This module enables PayPal Advance Checkout payment options for booking in the website. And it also allows you to manage transactions and refunds.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: This module will allow your guests to pay for their bookings using PayPal Payment Gateway on your website as well as from their PayPal Account. This secure payment gateway will simplify the payment process for your guests and will provide them with a sense of security. Integrating safe and easy-to-use payment gateways will increase the booking rates and revenue for your business.

module.name: qlohousekeeping
module.description: The Housekeeping add-on provides you the capability to monitor and manage all housekeeping operations in real-time. Using this add-on you can enhance the quality of service within your property.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: This module simplifies housekeeping management by allowing you to schedule tasks in advance. Designed for the hospitality industry, it helps streamline staff communication, save time, and efficiently manage housekeeping operations from a single platform.

module.name: qlomobikul
module.description: Use this addon to access mobile API endpoints for your website, enabling you to reach a wider customer base across various devices.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Hotel App Builder allows you to convert your QloApps front office into a complete mobile app. This addon allows your guest to experience all the functionalities of the QloApps front office on their Mobile phones

module.name: qlompstripepayment
module.description: QloApps Marketplace Stripe Payment Gateway helps marketplace admin to ease the process of splitting the admin and seller commission.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Marketplace Stripe Payment Gateway helps marketplace admin to ease the process of splitting the admin and seller commission.

module.name: qloredsyspayment
module.description: This module integrates Redsys Payment Gateway.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Redsys Payment Gateway empowers you to accept card payments with ease. By integrating with QloApps Redsys payment gateway, you can offer your guests a seamless and secure payment experience.

module.name: qlotripadvisorreview
module.description: This module enables Tripadvisor Reviews on various pages to enhance your website with valuable reviews and ratings from Tripadvisor.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Tripadvisor Addon facilitates the admin to automatically import and showcase your property's Tripadvisor reviews at various pages and positions on the QloApps Hotel Website.

module.name: qlobraintreepayment
module.description: This module allows guests to pay using Braintree Payment Gateway.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Braintree Payment Gateway: Integrate this payment gateway and allow your guests to pay for their bookings conveniently using this safe and secure mode of payment in just a few seconds.

module.name: qlogooglereview
module.description: QloApps Google Reviews Addon helps hoteliers to easily import the Google reviews of their property in QloApps and display them on the various pages of the hotel website to increase their hotel's credibility among visitors.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Google Reviews Addon helps you to earn trust and build credibility among your website visitors by highlighting the Google reviews of your hotel on your hotel website.This addon will automatically import your hotel's Google reviews in QloApps. Therefore, it will save you time and the effort of manually adding reviews. It also offers you the flexibility to choose the pages and positions where you want to display the imported Google reviews.Positive Google reviews create a positive brand image of your property in the minds of the website visitors and will increase the conversion rate on your website

module.name: qlopaystackpayment
module.description: With the help of this addon, your guests will be able to pay with Paystack payment options.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Paystack Payment Gateway: Offer a safe and secure payment gateway to ease your guest's payment process by integrating Paystack Payment Gateway in QloApps.

module.name: qloavailabilityratecalendar
module.description: QloApps Rate and Availability Calendar: Display your hotel rate and availability seamlessly on your website using the QloApps Rate and Availability Calendar add-on.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: Display your hotel rate and availability seamlessly on your website using the QloApps Rate and Availability Calendar add-on.

module.name: qloauthorizepayment
module.description: Accept payments using Authorize.net payment gateway
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: Easily integrate the secure and trusted Authorize.net payment gateway into your QloApps website to streamline online booking payments. Enable your guests to pay seamlessly with major cards like Visa, Mastercard, Discover, American Express, Japan Credit Bureau, and Diner's Club.

module.name: qlohourlybooking
module.description: This module provides the feature for guests to book rooms on hourly basis. It enables both hotel staff and guests to manage hourly reservations efficiently.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: Offer flexible hourly room bookings with dynamic pricing options.Enable room bookings by the hour with customizable time slots.Display real-time hourly availability and pricing on your website.Set pricing as fixed or percentage-based on day-wise rates.

module.name: qlosquarepayment
module.description: This module allows guests to securely pay using the Square payment gateway, ensuring a seamless and flexible payment experience.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Square Payment Gateway: Simplify your payment process with QloApps Square Payment Gateway. This addon ensures seamless and secure transactions by integrating Square’s robust payment system into your site, enhancing customer experience.

module.name: qloheadercustomcode
module.description: This addon lets you add custom code to header of the website to enhance your website’s functionality. This allows advanced customization and control over your site’s design and functionality.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Custom Code on Header Module empowers hoteliers to customize their website’s header by adding announcements, promotions, or offers, enhancing engagement and user experience.

module.name: qlooccupancybasedpricing
module.description: This addon lets you adjust room rates based on the number of guests, increasing your flexibility in pricing strategy.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: Optimize your hotel's pricing strategy with the QloApps Occupancy Based Pricing Module, designed to enhance revenue by dynamically adjusting rates based on room occupancy.

module.name: qloassaabloysmartlockconnector
module.displayName: QloApps Assa Abloy Smart Lock Connector
module.description: This addon integrates Assa Abloy smart locks with QloApps enabling more comfortable check-ins. It automates digital key generation, and synchronizes room access with reservation details.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Assa Abloy Smart Lock Connector: Enhance hotel security and guest convenience with the QloApps Assa Abloy Smart Lock Connector. Replace traditional keycards with secure, digital access codes.

module.name: qloavailabilitynotifier
module.description: The Hotel Room Availability Notifier module enables guests to be notified of desired room type availability. The system automatically checks and notifies all subscribed guests when the desired room becomes available.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Availability Notifier is a powerful add-on that allows hotel guests to subscribe for alerts on unavailable rooms and receive notifications via email or SMS once those rooms become available again.

module.name: qlotravelagentmanagement
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: Convert your website into a powerful travel agent platform where admins can grant access to travel agents to manage bookings, earn commissions, and streamline operations efficiently.

module.name: qloiyzicopayment
module.description: This module allows guests to pay using Iyzico Payment Gateway.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Iyzico Payment Gateway empowers you to accept secure online card payments effortlessly. By integrating with QloApps, you can provide your guests with a smooth, trusted, and seamless payment experience through Iyzico.

module.name: qlovoucherpromotion
module.description: Showcase different vouchers on various pages & positions of your website. Drive more bookings and boost conversions with QloApps Voucher Promotion.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: Attract more guests with exciting offers! Create and display personalized discount vouchers like early bird deals, last-minute offers, and festive promotions to boost hotel bookings effortlessly.

module.name: qlouniversalpayment
module.description: This module allows guests to pay with a wide range of universally accepted payment gateways.
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Universal Payment Gateway is an addon that empowers you to accept online payments through multiple payment gateways from a single platform. Instead of managing different gateways for different payment modes, hotels can centralize everything into one solution. Simplify global transactions, boost guest convenience, and ensure secure, seamless payments across multiple currencies and methods.

module.name: qlopos
module.displayName: QloApps Point of Sale System | POS
module.description: QloApps Point of Sale System helps hospitality businesses like hotels, resorts, B&Bs, and hostels to manage walk-in sales for outlets such as bars, spas, shops, and kiosks with ease
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: QloApps Point of Sale System - The module helps hotels, resorts, B&Bs, and hostels manage walk-in sales across outlets like bars, spas, shops, and kiosks with ease. Options like automatic stock synchronization, linking POS orders with room bookings, and flexible payments ensure faster operations and a smoother guest experience POS connects with barcode scanners, printers, and cash drawers to speed up checkout so your guests don’t have to wait impatiently for their turn. Imagine a busy hotel bar where guests are waiting in line to pay. The longer the process takes, the more impatient they become and some may even leave without completing their purchase. With QloApps POS, staff can quickly add items to the cart in a single click, select or create a customer, accept payments, and instantly place the order.

theme.name: single-page-theme
theme.description: QloApps Single page theme is used for the single hotel owner. It is a lightweight design theme built with the trendy design and easy to use interface.
theme.author: Webkul
theme.description_full: QloApps Single page theme is used for the single hotel owner. It is a lightweight design theme built with the trendy design and easy to use interface.

theme.name: qloapps-reimagined
theme.description: QloApps Reimagined Theme is a revolutionary theme for the hoteliers that will help to turn their existing website design into an Intuitive website with trendy UI design elements.
theme.author: Webkul
theme.description_full: QloApps Reimagined Theme is a revolutionary theme for the hoteliers that will help to turn their existing website design into an Intuitive website with trendy UI design elements.
